and z data, that means we would have 3 variables. Therefore, a single window of data would be
a 2-dimensional array with eight time steps and three features. One window would represent
one sample. One minute of data would represent 480 sensor data points, or 60 windows of eight
time steps. The total 10 minutes of data would represent 4,800 data points, or 600 windows of
data.
